title: CONTAINERYARD ORB / ultraliberal dream quest
description: Savoir Faire hears wealth humming in the container -- whether it's raised or lowered. Also gives you instant access to MRLBG.

dialogueTree.title: Savoir Faire: "Here we are. Whoever is in there de..."
dialogueTree.english: Here we are. Whoever is in there definitely has money, so let's convince them to part with it for our *exclusive* piece of art.
dialogueTree.polish: No i proszę. Ktokolwiek jest w środku, na pewno ma pieniądze. Przekonajmy go, żeby się z nimi rozstał w zamian za nasze *ekskluzywne* dzieło sztuki.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Ну і калі ласка. Хто б ні быў унутры, напэўна мае грошы. Давай пераканаем яго развітацца з імі ў абмен на наш *эксклюзіўны* твор мастацтва.

dialogueTree.title: Savoir Faire: "There! In that container you moved...."
dialogueTree.english: There! In that container you moved. There's *something* rich in there. We've got to get inside.
dialogueTree.polish: Tam! W tym kontenerze, który przesunąłeś. Tam jest *coś* na wypasie. Musimy się dostać do środka.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Там! У гэтым кантэйнеры, які ты перасунуў. Там ёсць *нешта* на ўзроўні. Нам трэба патрапіць унутр.

links.title: You: "But I already tried to convince it..."
links.english: But I already tried to convince it to open for me and failed.
links.polish: Ale próbowałem już przekonać go, żeby się otworzył, i nic z tego nie wyszło.
links.belarusian: Але я ўжо спрабаваў пераканаць яго адкрыцца, і нічога з гэтага не выйшла.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Then it's time to show you how a *m..."
links.english: Then it's time to show you how a *master* does it. No lock survives a round with Savvy. Get me up close.
links.polish: W takim razie czas pokazać ci, jak robią to *mistrzowie*. Żaden zamek nie przetrwa spotkania ze mną. Podejdźmy blisko.
links.belarusian: У такім выпадку час паказаць табе, як гэта робяць *майстры*. Ніякі замак не вытрымае сустрэчы са мной. Падыдзем бліжэй.

links.title: You: "What do you suggest?"
links.english: What do you suggest?
links.polish: Co mi poradzisz?
links.belarusian: Што ты мне параіш?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Opening the door? C'mon, I shouldn'..."
links.english: Opening the door? C'mon, I shouldn't have to tell you that. Get me up close and I'll show you how it's done.
links.polish: Żebyś otworzył drzwi? No bez żartów, nie powinienem musieć ci mówić takich rzeczy. Podejdźmy blisko, to ci pokażę, jak się to robi.
links.belarusian: Каб ты адчыніў дзверы? Ну без жартаў, я не павінен быў бы казаць табе такія рэчы. Давай падыдзем бліжэй, тады я пакажу табе, як гэта робіцца.

links.title: You: "Hear what?"
links.english: Hear what?
links.polish: Co?
links.belarusian: Што?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "The ominous hum of a preposterously..."
links.english: The ominous hum of a preposterously affluent individual... It seems to be coming from above us.
links.polish: Złowrogi pomruk skandalicznie wpływowej osoby... Zdaje się dobiegać gdzieś z góry.
links.belarusian: Злавесны гул скандальна ўплывовай асобы... Здаецца, даносіцца аднекуль зверху.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "You hear dock water quietly lapping..."
links.english: You hear dock water quietly lapping against seaweed-slimed concrete, but definitely no ominous hums.
links.polish: Słyszysz, jak woda przy nabrzeżu cicho smaga zarośnięty wodorostami beton, ale na pewno nie wychwytujesz żadnych złowrogich pomruków.
links.belarusian: Чуеш, як вада ля набярэжнай ціха шмагае параслі мохам бетон, але дакладна не лавіш ніякіх злосных рохкатаў.

links.title: You: "(Look up.)"
links.english: (Look up.)
links.polish: (Spójrz w górę).
links.belarusian: (Паглядзі ўверх).

links.title: Savoir Faire: "See that massive container there, h..."
links.english: See that massive container there, held up by that humongous crane? That's it! We need to get that box of treasures down. Try using that control panel over there.
links.polish: Widzisz ten potężny kontener na olbrzymim żurawiu? To ten! Musimy ściągnąć tę skrzynię ze skarbem. Spróbuj użyć tamtego panelu kontrolnego.
links.belarusian: Бачыш гэты магутны кантэйнер на велізарным кране? Гэта ён! Нам трэба зняць гэтую скрыню са скарбам. Паспрабуй выкарыстаць той кантрольны панэль.

links.title: Logic: "Hold up a minute... why should a pr..."
links.english: Hold up a minute... why should a preposterously affluent individual be hiding themselves in a container?
links.polish: Poczekaj no chwilę. Czemu skandalicznie wpływowa osoba miałaby się ukrywać w kontenerze?
links.belarusian: Пачакай хвілінку. Чаму скандальна ўплывовая асоба павінна хавацца ў кантэйнеры?

links.title: You: "Let's slow down here. Why would we..."
links.english: Let's slow down here. Why would we search for rich people in containers?
links.polish: Ale może powoli. Czemu mielibyśmy szukać bogatych ludzi w kontenerach?
links.belarusian: Але можа павольна. Чаму мы павінны шукаць багатых людзей у кантэйнерах?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "*Slow down*? We don't have time to..."
links.english: *Slow down*? We don't have time to slow down -- it's *crunch time*! Get your ass moving and control that crane! We've got sales to make.
links.polish: *Powoli*? Nie ma czasu na żadne *powoli*. Mamy masę pracy! Rusz dupsko i łap się za tego żurawia! Mamy towar do sprzedania.
links.belarusian: *Павольна*? Няма часу на ніякае *павольна*. У нас шмат працы! Рухай зад і бярыся за гэтага жураўля! У нас ёсць тавар на продаж.

links.title: You: "Yes, but..."
links.english: Yes, but...
links.polish: Tak, ale...
links.belarusian: Так, але...

links.title: Savoir Faire: "No 'buts', I want to see your *can-..."
links.english: No 'buts', I want to see your *can-do* attitude shine this time. Get moving!
links.polish: Żadnych „ale”. Chcę zobaczyć ochoczość i optymizm. Do roboty!
links.belarusian: Ніякіх "але". Хачу бачыць імкненне і аптымізм. За працу!

links.title: You: "No problemo, boss-man. On my way to..."
links.english: No problemo, boss-man. On my way to lower that crane... [Leave.]
links.polish: Nie ma sprawy, szefie. Już idę opuszczać ten kontener... [Odejdź].
links.belarusian: Няма праблем, шэфе. Ужо іду пакідаць гэты кантэйнер... [Адысці].

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Great *work* ethic, friend. No one..."
links.english: Great *work* ethic, friend. No one should be scared to get their hands dirty on the road to brilliant *success*.
links.polish: Wspaniała *etyka pracy*, przyjacielu. Nikt nie powinien bać się zabrudzić sobie rąk na drodze ku wspaniałemu *sukcesowi*.
links.belarusian: Цудоўная *этыка працы*, сябра. Ніхто не павінен баяцца выпацкаць рукі на шляху да цудоўнага *поспеху*.

links.title: You: "I don't see anyone. Are you sure?"
links.english: I don't see anyone. Are you sure?
links.polish: Nikogo nie widzę. Jesteś tego pewien?
links.belarusian: Я нікога не бачу. Ты ў гэтым упэўнены?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Yes, I'm sure. *Someone* here has a..."
links.english: Yes, I'm sure. *Someone* here has assets stacked away in OFCs. Look up.
links.polish: Tak. Mam pewność. *Ktoś* ma tutaj środki ulokowane w RP. Spójrz w górę.
links.belarusian: Так. У мяне ўпэўненасць. *Хтосьці* мае тут сродкі, размешчаныя ў РП. Паглядзі ўверх.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "OFCs or Offshore Financial Centres..."
links.english: OFCs or Offshore Financial Centres -- that's another word for tax havens. EPIS has adopted the OFFNET approach into their frameworks for addressing OFCs, but it's still a problem.
links.polish: RP, rajach podatkowych. EPIS stosuje w swoich schematach operacyjnych metodę wyłączania ich z sieci finansowej, nadal jednak stanowią problem.
links.belarusian: РП, падатковых раях. EPIS выкарыстоўвае ў сваіх аперацыйных схемах метад выключэння іх з фінансавай сеткі, аднак яны ўсё роўна ўяўляюць сабой праблему.

links.title: You: "Wait, you mean tax havens?"
links.english: Wait, you mean tax havens?
links.polish: Czekaj. Masz na myśli raje podatkowe?
links.belarusian: Пачакай. Ты маеш на ўвазе падатковыя сховішчы?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Tax havens, OFCs, Sinks, Conduits,..."
links.english: Tax havens, OFCs, Sinks, Conduits, *heavens*... Get with the terms, hustler-boy. Now look up!
links.polish: Raje podatkowe, *oazy*... chcesz być finansistą, to musisz znać terminologię. A teraz spójrz w górę.
links.belarusian: Падатковыя прытулкі, *аазы*... калі хочаш быць фінансістам, трэба ведаць тэрміналогію. А цяпер паглядзі ўверх.

links.title: You: "Wait, OFCs?"
links.english: Wait, OFCs?
links.polish: W RP?
links.belarusian: У РП?

links.title: You: "I don't hear anything."
links.english: I don't hear anything.
links.polish: Nic nie słyszę.
links.belarusian: Нічога не чую.

links.title: You: "You mean the rain?"
links.english: You mean the rain?
links.polish: Chodzi ci o ten deszcz?
links.belarusian: Ты пра гэты дождж?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "No, not the rain -- the ominous hum..."
links.english: No, not the rain -- the ominous hum of a *preposterously affluent individual*... It seems to be coming from above us.
links.polish: Nie, nie deszcz – złowrogi pomruk *skandalicznie wpływowej osoby*... Zdaje się dobiegać gdzieś z góry.
links.belarusian: Не, не дождж – злавесны рык *скандальна ўплывовай асобы*... Здаецца, даходзіць аднекуль зверху.

links.title: You: "Everything gets so quiet when it sn..."
links.english: Everything gets so quiet when it snows.
links.polish: Jak pada śnieg, zawsze robi się tak cicho.
links.belarusian: Калі падае снег, заўсёды становіцца так ціха.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "No, not the snow -- the ominous hum..."
links.english: No, not the snow -- the ominous hum of a *preposterously affluent individual*... It seems to be coming from above us.
links.polish: Nie, nie śnieg – złowrogi pomruk *skandalicznie wpływowej osoby*... Zdaje się dobiegać gdzieś z góry.
links.belarusian: Не, не снег – злавесны гул *скандальна ўплывовай асобы*... Здаецца, даносіцца аднекуль зверху.
